body.p: Actuarial assumptions do not reflect future benefit changes that are not set out in the formal terms of the plan (or a constructive obligation) at the end of the reporting period. Such changes will result in:

li.p: past service cost, to the extent that they change benefits for service before the change; and
current service cost for periods after the change, to the extent that they change benefits for service after the change.
